sentences.en: And so, we get many more statements of "Japanese uniqueness" and the impossibility of foreigners truly understanding Japan.
sentences.cn: 因此，我们得到了许多“日本的独特性”的陈述，而外国人不可能真正了解日本。

sentences.en: Creativity and uniqueness often depends on how well you hide your sources.
sentences.cn: 创意和独特性往往取决于如何隐藏你的创意来源。

sentences.en: Despite this uniqueness, there are some shared characteristics between people.
sentences.cn: 尽管干细胞有这种独特性, 但人们的干细胞还是具有一些共性.

sentences.en: Each time I returned I was struck by the uniqueness of Australia and its people.
sentences.cn: 每次返回，我都会惊讶于澳大利亚及其国民的与众不同。

sentences.en: FEW peoples are as proud of their uniqueness as are the Chinese.
sentences.cn: 很少有民族像中国人那样为自己独有的血统倍感自豪.

sentences.en: Good luck has uniqueness, give you only, do not give you twice.
sentences.cn: 机遇具有唯一性, 只给你一次, 不给你两次.

sentences.en: He actualizes his own unprecedented uniqueness and appreciates the uniqueness of others.
sentences.cn: 他必须充分发挥自己巨大的个性潜能,并懂得赞赏他人的与众不同之处.

sentences.en: He actualizes his own unprecedented uniquenessand appreciates the uniqueness of others.
sentences.cn: 他实现独特的永不重复的自我,同时也尊重他人的独特性.

sentences.en: In actuality, each Renaissance hotel has its own uniqueness and personality.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 万丽酒店的设计各有千秋,服务也各有特色.

sentences.en: Individual focus include autonomy, independence, uniqueness, comprehensiveness, and other attributes.
sentences.cn: 个体维度包含自主性 、 独立性 、 独特性、全面性等属性.

sentences.en: It was just such uniqueness of points of view that startled Ruth.
sentences.cn: 使露丝吃惊的正是他这类独特的见解.

sentences.en: No one everyone believed that the renal dialysis technology was a unique kind of technology, and it was because of that uniqueness that we believed it was affordable.
sentences.cn: 没有人认为，肾透析技术是一种独特的技术，而且由于这种独特性，我们就认为它是负担得起的。

sentences.en: The architectural design must capture the uniqueness of the football event.
sentences.cn: 建筑设计应抓住足球赛事的独特性.

sentences.en: The common conclusion was the uniqueness and necessity of Euclidean geometry.
sentences.cn: 欧几里德几何的唯一性与必要性已被公认.

sentences.en: The structure selectivity topological index achieves its uniqueness expression.
sentences.cn: 结构选择性达到惟一性表征.

sentences.en: The uniqueness of Shakespeare's historical play still behaves in its artistic style.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚历史剧的独特性还表现在它的艺术风格方面.

sentences.en: This (I hope) will be unique within the scope of the trace, and the combination of thread ID and random number should afford you uniqueness across multiple JVMs.
sentences.cn: 它（我希望如此）在跟踪的范围内将是唯一的，而线程 ID 和随机数的组合应该能够满足跨越多个 JVM 的唯一性。

sentences.en: Treasure your uniqueness . It is a gift given only to you!
sentences.cn: 珍视你的独一无二.这是一份只送给你的礼物!

sentences.en: Uniqueness - Does the company have any exclusivity, patents, etc?
sentences.cn: 独特 - 该公司是否有排他性, 专利等?

words.tran_cn: 独特的，稀罕的；[数] 唯一的，独一无二的
独特性；独一无二；单值性
